alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Harper; Woodward (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 6:11PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Ellis, Harper and northwestern Woodward Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 611 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles east of Laverne to 4 miles northeast of Fort Supply to 5 miles west of Woodward. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Woodward, Laverne, Buffalo, Fargo, Fort Supply, May, Selman, and Tangier. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
